model

Class AuctionCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AuctionCalendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AuctionCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Auction Calendar Class depicts the month wise auction list present in the auction central system.One can perform the following operations in this class.
    • Add Auction into Auction Calendar.
    • Remove Auction from Auction Calendar.
    • Add the Non Profit Organization User that has created the Auction.

    All of the business rules associated with the auctions are enlisted in this class.

    See Also:
    AbstractUser, Serialized Form

      • addAuction

        public void addAuction(Auction theAuction)
        Adds an auction to the auction calendar.

        Checks for duplicate auctions as well as maximum auctions in the month and in the day before adding it to the auction calendar.

        Parameters:
        theAuction - the details of the auction to be added to the auction calendar.
        See Also:
        Auction

      • removeAuction

        public void removeAuction(Auction theAuction)
        Removes an auction from the auction calendar.

        Checks for empty auction list in the particular month and prevents removing auctions that are currently in progress.

        Parameters:
        theAuction - the details of the auction to be added to the auction calendar.
        See Also:
        Auction

      • addUser

        public boolean addUser(users.AbstractUser theUser)
        Add a Non Profit Organization user to the Auction Calendar.

        Checks if the user already exits in the userlist and prevents it from creating more than one auction in an year.

        Parameters:
        theUser - the details of the Non Profit Organization user which has created the auction and will be added to the auction calendar.
        Returns:
        true if the user is successfully added to the user list; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        AbstractUser
